trans-unit.source: Holiday dates in dd-mm-yyyy format, one per line
Emails a confirmation on every scheduled appointment to the selected addresses
Email body text, as it appears in the email. See details for supported variables.

The following variables are supported:
###USER### : Name of the frontend user who owns the appointment ###AGENDA### : Name of the agenda ###TYPE### : Appointment type ###DATE### : Appointment date ###START_TIME### : Appointment start time ###END_TIME### : Appointment end time ###NOTES### : Notes ###NOTES_SU### : Superuser Notes ###ADDRESS### : Name and address information ###SECURITY### : Social Security Number ###LINK### : Link to appointment
Emails a calendar invitation on every scheduled appointment to the selected addresses
Calendar invitation description, which is shown in the invitation. See detail helptext of 'Email Body Text' for supported variables.
Determines when to send the configured confirmation email to the configured addresses
Determines when to send the configured confirmation email to the frontend user
Determines when to send the configured confirmation email to email addresses provided by the user in "Email confirmation" fields.
Determines when to send the configured calendar invitation to the configured addresses
